t: Neal Schon - Vortex [2CD] - Amazon.com Music
s: The rest of these 14 favorite cuts are 100% Neal Schon. The best way to describe much of this music is to say that it would make a great soundtrack for barreling down the highway on a Harley while not leaving one's brains at home. The drummer is formerly from Journey, Steve Smith. Keyboardist Jonathan Cain appears on one cut, and the rest of the keys are handled by Igor Lens (who I could find nothing at all about him). Old pal Jan Hammer also appears on a few cuts on the second CD...

t: Amazon.com: Journey Through Time: CDs & Vinyl
s: This is a concert with Neal Schon playing mostly songs from the first 3 Journey albums, with original Journey keyboard player and singer, Greg Rolie. It is 2 hours and 45 minutes long. It is on 3 CDs plus a video on DVD. It is a fantastic album if you like the hard rock style of the original ...

t: Beyond the Thunder by Schon, Neal (1995) Audio CD - Amazon.com Music
s: Schon with help from some of his old 'Bay Area' buddies and Jonathan Cain, I figured I would be filing the CD in the 'R&R' section of my collection...possibly the 'blues' section. After listen to it, I slid the CD into my 'Jazz' section. This is a beautifully produced collection of music that shows Neal at his smooth...seemingly effortless...best. Take the time to slip on a set of headphones, close your eyes and take a very pleasant 'audio ...
